description: Crispy pita bread and chickpeas with creamy tahini yoghurt and spices. Try this fatteh recipe for a crunchy, tasty snack or an impressive side.
name: Fatteh Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 420g canned Woolworths no-added-salt chickpeas, rinsed, drained
100g pita bread rounds, cut into 3.5cm pieces
1 sprig continental parsley, leaves picked, finely chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 200°C/180°C fan-forced. Line 2 large baking trays with baking paper. Place chickpeas on 1 tray and bread on second tray. Spray bread with oil. Bake for 12 minutes or until bread is golden and crisp, and chickpeas are warmed through.
Meanwhile, place yoghurt, tahini, garlic and 1/4 cup warm water in a small bowl and mix well to combine. Season.
Heat ghee in a small frying pan over medium heat. Add almonds, then cook for 2 minutes, stirring, or until golden. Remove pan from heat.
Place bread and chickpeas in a serving bowl. Top with yoghurt mixture. Drizzle over almond mixture, and sprinkle over parsley and sumac, then serve.
